Quinoa adds more protein and complex carbs for sustained energy. The variety of colorful veggies offers a broad spectrum of antioxidants: beta-carotene in carrots, anthocyanins in purple cabbage, vitamin C in bell peppers, etc., which collectively fight oxidative stress and support immune function. The ginger in the dressing aids digestion and reduces inflammation, while the vinegar and lime add gut-friendly acidity. It’s a refreshing meal that keeps energy stable and recovery on track.
